title: Deep Dish
features: DEEP DISH turns back the clock to 1975 - that groovy yesteryear of The Hustle, Mary Richards, mood rings and pet rocks - as it tells the swinging saga of the Davenport and Haze families, who fall in and out of love and lust in one cliffhanging chapter after another.
description: Sit down, relax and laugh your head off . . .
is a great read that is loads of fun . . . --
Marc Harshbarger lives in Chicago with his partner and two spoiled cats, Shubert and Mr. Grant. His favorite
episodes are: "Edie Gets Married", "Happy Birthday, Lou", "The Dinner Party", "Put On a Happy Face" and, of course, "Chuckles Bites The Dust".
